deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 2 mins
features: Can deliver smooth 100+ FPS performance in the world's most popular games, discrete graphics card required

body.description: With 4 cores and 8 processing threads the Ryzen 3 4100 processor delivers incredible productivity and gaming performance when paired with a discrete graphics card.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Founded in 1969 as a Silicon Valley start-up, the AMD journey began with dozens of employees focused on semiconductor products. From those modest beginnings, AMD has grown into one of the leading companies. Rooted in an innovation-driven culture, AMD employees collaborate every day to maximize the potential of modern computing, utilizing semiconductor innovation to transform how people live, work, learn and play

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it works great for a quad core type of setup
reviews.reviewText: i ran games like gta v and a few others with it although it was better when i upgrade from this to a 5600x but i thought this worked well for me til i was ready for my cpu upgrade i had no problems id still use it to this day if i didnt have my system updated further

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The go-to for any old processor upgrade
reviews.reviewText: I've had a 6th generation Intel CPU for the longest time and while back 6-7 years ago it would've been great, nowadays it was starting to show its age. This CPU is the best bang for your buck if you need a modern CPU upgrade without breaking the bank. It's not going to be the most powerful since it is last generations architecture with another core and some more cache, but if you need a nice upgrade, this is the way to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basic Economy Processor For Average Computer Builder
reviews.reviewText: No complaints at all. I have had this installed now for a month. No surprises as it works fine with it's own heatsink. Been 12 years since I upgraded with a new processor and motherboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product came 10 days after expected… did not work no fault to the manufacturer purchase. Shipping is based on estimate but has been consistently off every time i purchase. Give us realistic shipping in rural areas or nothing at all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great amd upgrade
reviews.reviewText: Exceeding all expectations this processor is a beast of a processor unit. Please note if personally installing processor make sure to download the newest version of your computer’s bios on a scan disk or your motherboard won’t communicate properly with your new processor and just a dab of thermal paste will do. All in all im extremely satisfied with this processor upgrade and cant beat the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactamente lo que esperaba
reviews.reviewText: Llego en perfecto estado y en el tiempo estimado

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am sure that my experience is outside the norm for Ryzen CPU's. I've had about 10 others before this one. I was doing an upgrade from a Ryzen R3 2200GE to this R3 4100 and adding a discrete GPU. Well after installing the 4100 I got nothing. After checking Asus site I found that, Opps, I needed to upgrade the bios. No biggie I thought, I'll just put the 2200GE back in and flash the mobo to the latest bios. Well the drama started there the previously working flawlessly ASUS PRIME A320M-K with the Ryzen R3 2200GE no longer posted at all. Curious but no worries I had a newer Asus PRIME B450M-A/CSM I had retired when I upgraded my personal computer to a R7 3700X in a Asus Tuf Gaming x570-plus board a couple of years back. I was saving the 450 to move the 3700X to when I upgrade my current CPU to a R7 5800. I knew the current bios accepts the 4100 as I checked the ASU support page for the board. Easy Peasey I installed the CPU and plugged everything in and nothing. I plugged in a R3 3200, nothing. I changed out the PSU, nothing. I removed the ram and installed a different kit, nothing. Mind you I tried this on both motherboards and on both the CPU fan would spin up and the stop. The only thing that happened to both previously working boards was the R3 4100. So maybe it's just bad luck and I rolled snake eyes with this one. I sent the CPU back and told Amazon what happened I hope it gets sent back to AMD to be checked out before it's sent on to someone else. Still love me some Ryzen though and this was an excuse to buy some more up to date equipment for my secondary back up build. Perhaps I'll just get a higher end Ryzen Based Mini PC.12-11-2023 I bought a AceMagician R7 5700U mini PC on a flash sale here on Amazon for $254.00. It meets my needs for a back up system by a good deal. I will wait for the Ryzen 8000 series CPU to retire my R7 3700X system altogether. I'll start saving up for it now as I am sure it'll be somewhat costly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did not come unlocked or OC possible.
reviews.reviewText: Great CPU for the money but the description said unlocked, that being said you cant OC this cpu through the ryzen master software for stable OC.It does preform well for most tasks, web browsing, youtube, movies, and some other light task.Gaming wise it tends to bottleneck, my GPU AMD Radeon RT 6650 XT runs smooth, the cpu goes to 100% on some games and it freezes up this is on medium to low settings.all in all good budget cpu but would recommend a cpu from the 5000 series for about 20 to 30 dollars more for a 5600 or 5600x.
No me imagine que el rendimiento iba a ser tan bueno.
I had to fix a few bent pins and noticed a pin was broken, but still works!

reviews.reviewTitle: サブPC用としては充分なCPU
reviews.reviewText: Windows上ではRyzen3 4100として認識され、4コア8スレッドで動作しています。
